summary: This document is an email correspondence from August 18, 2019, forwarding Jeffrey Epstein's will and probate petition. The email notes that Epstein created or amended his will on August 8, 2019, two days before his death, implying potential significance regarding the circumstances of his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The document is about his will and probate petition, which was created or amended on August 8, 2019, two days before his death in custody.

events.title: Epstein Creates or Amends Will
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein either created or meaningfully amended his last will and testament.

events.title: Death of Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein died by reported suicide while in federal custody at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein's will and probate petition are the subject of this email correspondence.
Epstein created or meaningfully amended his will on August 8, 2019, just two days before his death on August 10, 2019.
The email's subject line and tone ('Lest there be any lingering doubt...') suggest the timing of the will's creation is seen as suspicious or significant regarding the circumstances of his death.
